Tool1 Dispensaries source the highest quality products for our customers

Tool1 Dispensaries offer the best selection, quality, and price.

We work with licensed growers and product manufactures to source a wide selection of premium flower options, and other in-demand marijuana infused products.

At Tool1 our mission is to provide customers with a wide variety of product options at competitive prices. We are able to serve customers looking for both Medical and Recreational Marijuana products.

The knowledgeable staff at Tool1 is well trained to help our customers determine what products will work best for them. We strive to continually expand our staff’s product knowledge so they are able to provide our customers with the best product recommendations possible.
